views.markdown:
A bright, clean outline theme with massive customisation

**Now with over 1,300 apps themed. This is the last update on Bigboss - please follow me on Twitter @jammytea2 to purchase and for further updates**
Stencil requires Anemone and works on iOS 8 upwards. This update is streamlined for iOS11,  and removes certain elements now available elsewhere.

This package includes the main theme and a glyph variant, plus four alts of each with different shadings and fills.

Included are:
• 1,100+ themed icons. AppStore and Cydia icons in 2 main themes and 8 alt versions
• Folder background
• Respring logo
• Settings and share sheet icons in main and glyph versions
• Customised icons for Apple Weather UI, which also feeds into Forecast, Twig, SimpleLS
• Wallpapers
• 21 background tints, each with its own folder icon and background. Each alt of the theme interacts differently with the tints, to create over 200 possible variations. Experiment with stacking to find your favourite! With Anemone's alt icon selecter, you can activate multiple versions and customise each app.

Each version of the theme and/or background has its own:
• Badges
• Page dots
• Status bar
• Activity spinners

Unthemed icons stick out a mile, so I'm happy to take icon requests. Tweet meor use the.

Upcoming:
• Full ios11 theming for a couple of newly added elements
• Control center
• More icons!

Follow me on Twitter () for access to my public Dropbox, where you can download extra parts of the theme for ios9 and 10, plus a few other random bits

Now 1,300+ themed icons. • 100 new icons - now 800+ apps themed, in each theme variant, including iOS11 stock additions
• Fixed status bar wi-fi (finally)
• Added new settings icons.
